snippet: A group of small-factory owners in the ailing Ota district of Tokyo has built a bobsled in an effort to show others that a better future lies in a shift to producing precision products.
abstract: Tokyo Journal; 32 small factory owners in Ota industrial district in Tokyo have joined forces in hopes of manufacturing world-class bobsled for Japanese team to race in 2014 Olympics; group hopes to rescue tradition of industrial craftsmanship and give much-needed boost to fading industrial area.
lead_paragraph: A group of small-factory owners in the ailing Ota district of Tokyo has built a bobsled in an effort to show others that a better future lies in a shift to producing precision products.

headline.seo: In a Tokyo Workshop District, a Sled to Better Days
headline.main: A Fading District Pins Its Hopes on a Bobsled
headline.print_headline: A Fading District Pins Its Hopes on a Bobsled
